definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: It is also known to promote more systemic reactions than interferon .
sentences.chinese: 比及干擾素更能導致全身反應。

sentences.english: There is no need to rush at finishing the job. It can wait till tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 無需倉皇地完成這項工作，能夠比及明天完成。

sentences.english: Its returns are insignificantly small compared with the investments.
sentences.chinese: 比及投資，它的回報是非常小的。

sentences.english: SongChuChu prank said next time, and let RongSheng ratio please his watch movies.
sentences.chinese: 宋楚楚惡作劇說比及下次吧，讓榮生請他看片子。

sentences.english: By dawn Lord Guan and his commanders, waving flags and beating drums, were bearing down in large ships.
sentences.chinese: 比及平明，關公及衆將皆搖旗鼓譟，乘大船而來。

definition: variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
needless to say/it goes without saying
to compare/to draw a parallel/to match/analogy/metaphor/comparison
